remarks: Equinumerosity law for set exponentiation of a Cartesian product. Exercise 4.47 of [Mendelson] p. 255.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Feb-2004.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2014.)
statement:
xpmapen.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
xpmapen.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
xpmapen.3 $e |- C e. _V $.
xpmapen $p |- ( ( A X. B ) ^m C ) ~~ ( ( A ^m C ) X. ( B ^m C ) ) $.
